benchmark_name: GE Vernova Knowledge Graph QA Benchmark
description: 20 benchmark questions to test the ReAct QA agent on GE Vernova products and services knowledge graph

questions.question: What is the headquarters location of GE Vernova?
When was GE Vernova formed as a spin-off from General Electric?
What is the maximum power output of the Haliade-X offshore wind turbine platform?
questions.expected_answer: Up to 18 MW (with models ranging from 12 MW to 18 MW)

questions.question: What is the rotor diameter of the Haliade-X 13 MW wind turbine?
What is the combined cycle efficiency of GE Vernova's 9HA gas turbine?
questions.expected_answer: Greater than 61% (up to 64% for newer configurations)

questions.question: What is the simple cycle output difference between the 9HA.01 and 9HA.02 gas turbines?
questions.expected_answer: 9HA.01 is 397 MW and 9HA.02 is 470 MW, a difference of 73 MW

questions.question: Which GE Vernova business unit manufactures wind turbine blades?
How many gas turbines does GE Vernova have installed globally?
What is the installed capacity of GE Vernova's onshore wind turbine fleet?
questions.expected_answer: Over 120 GW from approximately 57,000 wind turbines

questions.question: What hydrogen blending capability do GE Vernova's 9HA gas turbines currently support?
questions.expected_answer: 50% hydrogen by volume, with a technology pathway to 100%

questions.question: Which wind farm uses GE Vernova's Haliade-X turbines and how many turbines will be installed?
questions.expected_answer: Dogger Bank Wind Farm with 277 Haliade-X turbines (mix of 13 MW and 14 MW)

questions.question: What are the three main business segments of GE Vernova?
What is the voltage rating capability of GE Vernova's HVDC converter transformers?
questions.expected_answer: Up to 800 kV DC and 1200 kV AC, with power ratings up to 2750 MVA

questions.question: Which companies were merged to form GE Vernova?
questions.expected_answer: GE Power, GE Renewable Energy, GE Digital, and GE Energy Financial Services

questions.question: What is the fast start capability of GE Vernova's LM2500XPRESS gas turbine package?
questions.expected_answer: Five-minute fast start, capable of starting independent of the power grid

questions.question: What is GE Vernova's gas turbine backlog expected to be at the end of 2025?
Where is LM Wind Power headquartered and how many production facilities does it operate?
questions.expected_answer: Headquartered in Kolding, Denmark, with 12-13 production facilities in 8 countries

questions.question: How much annual energy can a single Haliade-X 14.7 MW turbine generate?
questions.expected_answer: Up to 76 GWh annually, enough to power 20,000 European households

questions.question: How does a GE Vernova H-class combined-cycle plant's CO2 emissions compare to a coal-fired plant?
questions.expected_answer: 60% less CO2 emissions compared to a similarly sized coal-fired asset

questions.question: What is GE Vernova's total installed HVDC capacity globally?
questions.expected_answer: More than 35 GW of installed HVDC capacity

evaluation_metrics.factual_accuracy: Does the answer contain the correct facts?
evaluation_metrics.completeness: Does the answer address all aspects of the question?
evaluation_metrics.reasoning_chain: For multi-hop questions, is the reasoning chain visible?
